name: IBANValidator_isValidTest
description: Unit tests for the IBANValidator isValid method, covering various scenarios including valid and invalid IBANs.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithValidIBAN
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a valid IBAN.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithInvalidLength
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with an IBAN of invalid length.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithInvalidFormat
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with an IBAN containing invalid characters.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithNullCode
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a null IBAN.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithEmptyCode
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with an empty IBAN.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithUnknownCountryCode
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with an IBAN containing an unknown country code.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithLowercaseCountryCode
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with an IBAN containing a lowercase country code.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithInvalidCheckDigit
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with an IBAN containing an invalid check digit.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithValidIBANForOtherCountryCode
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a valid IBAN for a different country code.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithValidIBANForMultipleCountryCodes
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a valid IBAN for multiple country codes.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithValidIBANForShortestLength
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a valid IBAN of the shortest length.

test_cases.name: testIsValidWithValidIBANForLongestLength
test_cases.description: Tests the isValid method with a valid IBAN of the longest length.
